content:
Hi @Chris Moesel ,

I am wondering why the JSON files within this tool do not follow the standard for FHIR resources. This is the tool I am referring to:
https://github.com/AHRQ-CDS/AHRQ-CDS-Connect-PAIN-MANAGEMENT-SUMMARY/tree/master/src

@Joel Francis @Alex Goel

Thank you,
Christa

Which specific JSON files are you referring to? There are

  • ELM JSON files, which are not intended to be FHIR resources
  • valueset-db.json, which is an internal value set cache format (but I suppose could have been represented as a FHIR bundle of value sets)
  • FHIR bundles for test patients (which should be standard FHIR resources)
